trainable.custom_layers.custom_focal_module¶

trainable.custom_layers.custom_focal_module(input_shape, units, focal_depth)¶

focal modulation block inspired by https://arxiv.org/pdf/2203.11926.pdf except in this version I make whatever changes I want to

Parameters

  • units – channel size of the output, number of channels in the convolutions

  • focal_depth – number of convolutional layers in the hierarchal contextualzation

Returns

a keras layer
